about_the_game:
Join the Community

The Sery's world


Welcome to the mythical world of Oniteria, where you’ll embark on an adventure that brings players into a new, fantastical universe, filled with legends of the land.

Dive into "Sery: Into the World of Myths," where myths, legends, and folklore from all cultures come to life. Those who know these stories can experience the adventures they offer in dreams.

Few know, but mythical imaginations live on in the dreams of those who are familiar with the stories. However, legends, myths, and ancient tales are being forgotten by the people. If no one remembers them anymore, they will cease to exist, causing an imbalance in the world.

Fascinated by these legends, Sery finds his dreams invaded by malevolent figures and is summoned to restore balance between the real world and the world of dreams. Only Sery still has the ability to feel and harness the power of legendary mythical entities to save the dream world and prevent the collapse of humanity.

The Game


Embark on this epic journey and help Sery master magical power-ups and face extraordinary adventures to save the world of dreams from darkness. "Sery: Into the World of Myths" is a precision 2D platformer with intuitive gameplay that demands great skill from the player in a pixel art environment.

With a retro style both visually and in gameplay, using only arrow keys and a few buttons for jumping and actions, the game encourages skill, quick thinking, and agility. Use your abilities to complete challenging missions and uncover various hidden secrets.



Sery gains new powers throughout the journey, which are used to overcome the most difficult challenges.



Where can you go with such powers?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Dual-core processor (e.g., Intel Core i3)
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with at least 1GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad-core processor (e.g., Intel Core i5)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with 2GB or more VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Dive into the mythical dream world of Sery for an epic adventure. In this precision 2D platformer, Sery must restore balance between the real world and the dream world, battling malevolent figures that invade her dreams.
